pullrequest.title: Compatibility with coloured output from subprocesses

content.raw:
I think this looks good. I don’t have time to do any testing \(thesis!\) but I’m happy with the general idea here.

If the test code is going to use zprocess, we should probably consider adding a requirements.txt file \(or whatever we have to do to make sure it’s installed as a dependency\). Alternatively, maybe just not include zprocess in the testing code?
content.html:
I think this looks good. I don’t have time to do any testing (thesis!) but I’m happy with the general idea here.

If the test code is going to use zprocess, we should probably consider adding a requirements.txt file (or whatever we have to do to make sure it’s installed as a dependency). Alternatively, maybe just not include zprocess in the testing code?
